column5: Talked my lifelong friend and fishing buddy Rand "The Impaler" into giving kayak fishing a try. We chose Shades mill in Cambridge because of it's small size and lack of stinkpots. He caught 2 largemouth and I caught a smallie and a pike. Man was it hot out there today. Here's the pics.        Water temps were 77F and the air felt like 100F.
WTG on persevering in the heat.
